features: Replaceable head manual toothbrush for 80% less plastic* * Compared to similarly sized Colgate toothbrushes
Floss-Tip bristles gently reach 4x deeper below the gum line and between teeth This toothbrush does not replace flossing vs. an ordinary flat trim toothbrush
A grip that doesn’t slip for control while brushing
Cleans teeth, tongue, cheeks and gums
body.description: Less plastic waste—more clean! Colgate Keep is a manual toothbrush for adults that uses 80% less plastic compared to similarly sized Colgate toothbrushes. This set comes complete with an aluminum toothbrush handle and 2 replaceable brush heads. More replacement brush heads can be purchased on Amazon. This more sustainable toothbrush simultaneously promotes a deep clean by using it's floss-tip bristles. The soft floss-tip bristles gently reach 4x deeper below the gum line versus an ordinary flat-trim toothbrush so the bristles can reach between teeth. This toothbrush should not replace flossing. Plus, our unique tongue and cheek cleaner helps brushing teeth alone with an ordinary flat-trim toothbrush. Colgate Keep has a long-lasting and lightweight aluminum handle with a grip that doesn’t slip for control while brushing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great reusable metal handle and less waste alternative toothbrush!
reviews.reviewText: I like the concept of a reusable manual toothbrush handle and how the Colgate Keep Deep Clean Floss-Tip Toothbrush can reduce plastic waste by up to 80%. The handle is well constructed of durable lightweight aluminum, comfortable to hold, simple to clean. However, it might not fit in some of the standard/decorative toothbrush holders but it will fit in most travel cases. The soft floss-tip brush bristles do a great job cleaning the hard-to-reach places, the brush head clips securely onto the handle, has a tongue cleaner on the back side, stays firmly in place, is easy to replace, and lasts for 2-3 months. I like that the Starter Kit included 2 Brush Heads and this one was reasonably priced as compared to other sellers. It’s a great value for the price and helps decrease environmental costs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the idea of a toothbrush where only the head needs to be replaced. The handle is comfortable in my hand and feels very sturdy. The brush is soft and cleans my teeth very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Insect Inside Packaging
reviews.reviewText: I've used the product for years and love it, it's great when brushing and the plastic-saving aspect is amazing, but when opening a new one to replace my old handle there was an insect inside the packaging. Revolting! Thankfully it's simple to return and no big hassle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Why not make them all this way?
reviews.reviewText: I think it's a great idea, but in order for it to really take off Colgate should transition all their toothbrush offerings to this system to A) further reduce overall plastic usage and B) ensure customers that they'll never have to worry about the whole "keep" line of products being cancelled, leaving them with a useless aluminum decoration. That said, the handle itself is surprisingly ergonomic and feels very premium compared to a standard plastic toothbrush. The handle and two brush heads for $4-6 (depending on color option, at time of writing) feels like a very fair price, I just wish it would become their standard offering rather than some "specialty product" to check a box for "environmentally conscious consumers" or whatever naming convention they surely use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EcoFriendly, Feels Great and Sleek
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a good, more eco-friendly toothbrush. And this is it. My favorite part is the handle. It is metal and has a good grip and style. I saw the comments about it not fitting into cups with holes for tooth brushes, but I was already keeping my tooth paste and tooth brush in a decorative cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper then retail
reviews.reviewText: Got these cause they were cheaper than retail. Work as intended and are a good alternative if you can wait a few shipping days for replacement toothbrush heads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pro:- feels GREAT, which motivates me to brush- looks lovely which also motivates me to brush- the heads are replaceable so you finally can justify buying a tooth brush head instead of buying an entire toothbrush.Con:- the heads might be a liiiitle too rough. I wish they had other softer heads as other options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy solid toothbrush!
reviews.reviewText: Great too brush and the bristles are strong! I hope they have replacement heads you can get.

Llegó súper rápido y en perfectas condiciones. Es más ligero de lo que creí, la calidad y diseño se ven y se sienten bastante bien. Cepilla muy bien tiene limpiador de lengua y es fácil de intercambiar los repuestos (duro pero basta con jalarlo). El precio me parece un poco elevado pero creo que vale la pena. Lo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Bought this toothbrush after a lot of reviews! Can’t get a better manual toothbrush than this. Colgate have done a brilliant job with this product. Lightweight, easy & comfortable to hold and brush. Time will tell if it’s build quality lasts and how long it will go. Best thing is that can replace the brush head without replacing the whole thing. What more can you want and ask for in a every essential and necessity :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Really like the feel of this toothbrush. My teeth feel incredibly clean after use. This is the second one of these items I have. Now my daughter likes hers too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The handle needs some work as no matters how you hold it it is just uncomfortable and wrong, which is a real shame as the idea is perfect
